integrations_researched.name: GitHub CLI (gh)

verified_package.name: gh
verified_package.install_command: brew install gh (macOS) | See https://cli.github.com for other platforms

key_functions: gh pr view <number> - View PR details
gh pr view <number> --json reviews - Get review data in JSON
gh issue view <number> - View issue details
api_patterns.verified_against: Official GitHub CLI documentation at https://cli.github.com/manual/

gotchas: gh pr view --comments does NOT include inline review comments by default
To get detailed inline review comments, need multiple API calls or use gh-pr-review extension
gh pr view --json reviews only returns review body, state, and author - NOT line-by-line comments
Authentication required via 'gh auth login' before use

integrations_researched.name: gh-pr-review Extension

api_patterns.initialization: Install via: gh extension install agynio/gh-pr-review
key_functions: gh pr-review review view - Returns entire assembled review structure
Full inline PR review comment support
View, navigate, reply to, and resolve review threads from terminal

gotchas: This is a third-party extension, not official GitHub CLI command
Designed specifically for LLM-ready and automated PR review agents
Solves the limitation of gh pr view not showing inline comments

integrations_researched.name: ChatGPT Codex Connector

verified_package.name: chatgpt-codex-connector
verified_package.install_command: GitHub App installation via GitHub Marketplace

api_patterns.initialization: Install GitHub App from marketplace, authorize for repositories
key_functions: Automated PR reviews when PR is opened or marked ready
Can be mentioned in Slack via @Codex for context-aware responses
api_patterns.verified_against: OpenAI Help Center and GitHub Apps marketplace

dependencies: ChatGPT Plus, Pro, Business, Edu, or Enterprise plan required

gotchas: Codex is a cloud-based service - runs in sandboxed environment
GitHub App must be authorized for specific repositories
Review comments are posted as bot comments in PR
If no suggestions, Codex reacts with üëç instead of commenting
Governed by separate OpenAI terms of service and privacy policy

integrations_researched.name: Project Stack - React/TypeScript

verified_package.name: punchline-x
verified_package.install_command: npm install (installs all dependencies from package.json)

api_patterns.initialization: npm run dev - Start development server with Vite
key_functions: npm run build - Production build (tsc + vite build)
npm run preview - Preview production build

gotchas: Using React 19 (latest) - may have breaking changes from React 18
Using Tailwind CSS v4 - major version with new architecture
ESLint 9 uses new flat config format

unverified_claims.claim: Specific Codex review feedback for PR #4 commit 563ece1fbd
unverified_claims.reason: Cannot access actual review comments without fetching from GitHub - requires gh pr view or API call to PR #4
unverified_claims.recommendation: Must fetch actual Codex review to determine what fixes are needed

unverified_claims.claim: Files that need to be modified for 'Fix #2'
unverified_claims.reason: Issue title 'Codex PR Fix #2' doesn't specify what the second fix refers to or which files are affected
unverified_claims.recommendation: Review PR #4 diff and Codex comments to identify affected files

recommendations: Use 'gh pr view 4 --json reviews,comments' to fetch PR #4 details and review data
Consider installing gh-pr-review extension for better inline comment visibility: gh extension install agynio/gh-pr-review
Use 'gh api repos/AmbitiousRealism2025/punchline-x/pulls/4/reviews' for detailed review data
Check PR #4 commit diff to understand what changes were reviewed by Codex
The Codex review link in the issue points to: https://github.com/AmbitiousRealism2025/punchline-x/pull/4#pullrequestreview-3633255069
Run 'npm run lint' before implementing fixes to identify existing linting issues
next_steps: Fetch PR #4 details using GitHub CLI
Retrieve Codex review comments from review ID 3633255069
Analyze commit 563ece1fbd to see what code was reviewed
Identify specific issues flagged by Codex
Create implementation plan based on Codex feedback
